statements.statement: select com_cd , item_type , item_cd , substr(item_cd,1,2) prod_group, parent_cd , short_name , full_name , tax_flag , price , dz_amt , web_flag , delete_flag , input_id , input_dt , modify_id , modify_dt , sort_order from tm_item where item_type = 'M' and delete_flag = 'N' order by item_cd, short_name, full_name

select com_cd , item_type , item_cd , parent_cd , short_name , full_name , tax_flag , price , case When coalesce(dz_amt, 0) = 0 Then price * 12 Else dz_amt End as dz_amt , case When nvl(cast(price as numeric), 0) = 0 Then 1 When nvl(cast(dz_amt as numeric), 0) = 0 Then 1 Else dz_amt / (price * 12) End dc_ratio , web_flag , delete_flag , input_id , input_dt , modify_id , modify_dt , sort_order from tm_item where item_type = 'S' and delete_flag = 'N' --and parent_cd = :parent_cd
select auto_print, tax_ratio from (select code_value1 auto_print from tm_code where class = 'C03') a, (select code_num1 tax_ratio from tm_code where class = 'C04') b
